query: SELECT questionNumber, LEFT(questionText, 60) as question, standardDescription, guidance FROM complianceQuestions WHERE questionNumber = '1.3' AND sectionId IN (SELECT id FROM complianceSections WHERE sectionType = 'service_user' AND sectionNumber = 1) LIMIT 1
